name: Hani
greetingText: I really like your name, by the way!
wishText: May God always be with you and bless every step you take!
text1: It's your birthday again! I always remember this date :D
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday Hani! God bless you always <3
text2: It's time to send a simple birthday wish.
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click here, if you want to watch it again.
text6: Spending every day with you is a joy.
text7: Oh, I've always liked you, and if you feel the same way, you can text me anytime.
